name: BackGuiner: Yomigaeru Yuusha-tachi: Kakusei-hen Guiner Tensei
overview: BackGuiner: Yomigaeru Yuusha-tachi: Kakusei-hen Guiner Tensei (バックガイナー～よみがえる勇者たち～覚醒編「ガイナー転生」) is a simulation game for the Sega Saturn. This game was scheduled to be made as a trilogy, but the final chapter was not released.
